metadata.title: CVE-2023-38324 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenNDS before 10.1.2. It allows users to skipthe splash page sequence (and directly authenticate) when it is using thedefault FAS key and OpenNDS is configured as FAS. Affected OpenNDS CaptivePortal before version 10.1.2 fixed in OpenWrt master, OpenWrt 23.05 andOpenWrt 22.03 on 28. August 2023 by updating OpenNDS to version 10.1.3.

criterions.comment: opennds package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
